explains: n. （轮胎的）破洞；（被尖物刺穿的）小洞
v. 刺破，戳破；削弱，揭穿；突然打破（平静）
wordGroup: lumbar puncture [医]腰椎穿刺（等于spinal tap）

sentences.en: An instrument called a trocar makes a puncture in the abdominal wall.
sentences.cn: 一种叫作套管针的器械会在腹壁上扎一个小孔。

sentences.en: Somebody helped me to mend the puncture.
sentences.cn: 有人帮我补了车胎上的洞。

sentences.en: I had a puncture on the way and arrived late.
sentences.cn: 我在路上扎破了轮胎，所以迟到了。
